lines.dialogue: I almost ran out of time on that exam…
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Me too, there was a question that almost took me a half-hour!
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Same here. That was so frustrating….
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: That study guide provided by the professor doesn’t help at all.
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Anyway, we got this! I believe we can survive through this week!
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: ...That’s nice of Jasmine to say so...
For sure! By the way, are you waiting for someone?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Yeah, I believe Frank will be here soon.
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Wait, is that Frank?
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Yeah, It's him.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Hi, Frank.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Hey, Meimei, Jasmine. Why are you guys here?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: We've just finished our classes and exam.
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Yeah, that was a tough class… Have a seat.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Sure. Thanks.
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Did you guys see the ESPN comments by the coach? So obvious he’s for the West Coast.
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Yeah! Which team do you think will win this year’s Vince Lombardi Trophy?
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: ...Trophy?...
Honestly, I'm not sure.
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: But there is a lot of prediction showing that the team from the West Coast has better odds.
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: By the way, guess who will perform at the halftime show this year!
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Lady Gaga? Right? I cannot wait to see her!
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: ...Halftime show?...
Wait… What are you guys talking about?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Um…… Have you heard of the Super Bowl before?
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Well. The Super Bowl is the most famous football championship game around the world!
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Exactly! You know who introduced Travis Scott during the 2019 halftime show? That was Squidward!
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Oh really? The Squidward with Travis Scott? I will try to find some videos on YouTube and take a look at them later.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Yeah. And I know Budweiser beer commercials with Clydesdale horses are always getting a lot of attention!
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Um… the Clydesdale horses? Actually, I’m not a fan of beer... That sounds quite familiar but I really don’t remember it...
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: You’re right! And the Vince Lombardi trophy is named after the coach who won the first two Super Bowls.
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Oh, that trophy has its own name?  Vince Lombardi? I believe he must be a very famous person in the football league.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Meimei if you are interested in the Super Bowl, we can always share some interesting stories with you.
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Yeah…. Sure. But how about we grab something to eat first? I’m starving now.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Yeah…. Sure. But how about we grab something to eat first? I’m starving now.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: I just ate pizza yesterday. Let's grab something new…
Wow, they got Pork dumplings here? Let’s have a try!
Oh, dumplings again? Are they good?
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Of course! They are very delicious.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: But you actually have a lot of choices here, why don't you try something else?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Cause it's about the time for the Lunar New Year. And the dumpling is an important part of it.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Got it! Did you just say Lunar New Year? What's the difference from ours?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Spring festival... Is that the same as Lunar New Year in your culture?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Same here. What exactly is the Lunar New Year?
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: ...That’s a little bit complicated...
Sounds great! Is there something like the halftime show in spring festival?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: We called it spring festival gala! It’s a Chinese New Year special!
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: I cannot wait to watch it on YouTube. That must be so interesting!
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: That makes sense! How do you guys usually celebrate the Lunar New Year?
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Well, like eating dumplings, making spring couplets and so on!
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Nice! Please let me know if you have a party for it, I’d like to join!
lines.name: Jasmine

lines.dialogue: Oh. That's the lunar calendar right? So do you get used to our calendar now?
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Actually, we are using the solar calendar as our everyday calendar.
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: Oh, my bad. I thought you guys are normally using the lunar calendar.
lines.name: Frank

lines.dialogue: Haha! So would you like to try some dumplings?
lines.name: Meimei

lines.dialogue: It’s ok. Totally understood.
lines.name: Meimei
